title: Riven Battle Bunny Skin Sound
body: The sound when battle bunny riven hits a q isn't there, so its just silence and cant hear if u hit the target or not.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! Looks like this should be resolved in patch 6.20.
Hi, also i noticed it started when the new chromas came out for riven. Thanks for the reply, it was difficult playing her without the sound.
